lines.text: Be sure that somebody don't talk you into paroling that gang. Especially that Chinaman! He made a lot of threats against me if I had only understood 'em.
I thought you were only supposed to work for Mr. Ballard.
I see. Rita's just a hobby. Well, don't let her pull the wool over your eyes.
Maybe I like wool pulled over my eyes.
I don't want the state of Nevada to kill me. I can attend to that myself.
I tell yuih, I'm gittin' riled up. When I get riled up, somebody's gonna land in jail!
